attributes.action: stop the congestion charge planned for the city of Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We dont want a congestion charge for the city of Manchester as it is discriminating against the people who live out side the city & have to commute every day. Also it may damage commerce in the city!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
